isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION CARRIERS: ROCKWELL - VEHICLE TOWING INSTRUCTIONS - INSTALL AXLE SHAFTS

step1.para: Remove the covers from the hubs.

If the drive axle(s) is equipped with a main differential lock, shift the differential to the unlocked (disengaged) position. Install the axle shafts with two sets of splines and new gaskets in the correct locations as follows:

step2.para: Push the right axle shaft and gasket into the hub and housing until the shaft stops against the shift collar.
Push down and in on the axle shaft flange and rotate the shaft until the splines of the shaft and collar are engaged.
Push the axle shaft further into the housing until the shaft stops against the differential side gear.
Push down on the axle shaft flange and rotate the shaft until the splines of the shaft and side gear are engaged.
Push the axle shaft completely into the housing until the flange and gasket are flush against the hub.

step1.para: Install the left axle shaft following the procedures described above.
Check the lubricant level in the axles and hubs where the axle shafts were removed. Add lubricant if necessary. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION.
